column2:
"Mmmm, yeah... even looking at it from up here,
it doesn't really seem any different..."

"Oh, <%me>!
It's good to see you."
"Taking a break?"
"What's up?"

"No, I'm on a job...
but also kind of taking a break."

"I went outside for
a change of pace."

"I just thought I'd come out
to get some fresh air."

"It gets a little stuffy being in
the Command Room all the time."
"Ah, right."

"I was just assembling all of the data from
the expeditions in the Kvaris region, but..."
"Would you like to hear about it?"
"Alright, I'll start."
"Presently, Kvaris is a snow-covered, cold environment."

"However, it's been recorded that it
was once a temperate, verdant land."
"It was once similar to how Aelio is today."

"In those days, many people lived and prospered in Kvaris--
even moreso than the Aelio and Retem of today."

"Unfortunately, Dark Falz attacked,
and it became like that overnight..."

"Okay, \"overnight\" might be a bit of an exaggeration,
but there's no doubt the climate changed very rapidly."

"We're still sorely lacking in data about
what exactly caused this to happen."

"Though Dark Falz himself had disappeared, Kvaris
residents were nevertheless forced to evacuate..."

"Many fled to Aelio, and would
go on to build this Central City."

"It's also said that a portion
of evacuees moved to Retem."

"Ever since, Kvaris has
remained practically uninhabited."

"The long-term vanguard team we sent to
Kvaris was the largest such operation to date."

"For a long time, both Aelio and Retem have had
their hands full protecting their own regions..."

"Thanks to the efforts of all of you, however,
we were finally able to expand into Kvaris."
"We can't thank you enough."

"As for current developments within Kvaris, I think the
vanguard members themselves would have all the details."

"Please ask around when you
next pay them a visit."

"If I didn't have this job as an Operator, I
would've liked to volunteer for the vanguard myself..."

"If you don't mind, please tell me
what it's like up there one of these days."
"It was good seeing you!"
